content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: red_sandstone_stairs
inventory=[{"type": "anvil", "quantity": 14, "index": 11}, {"type": "enderman_spawn_egg", "quantity": 54, "index": 13}, {"type": "white_concrete_powder", "quantity": 12, "index": 16}, {"type": "white_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 6, "index": 17}, {"type": "redstone_ore", "quantity": 3, "index": 18}, {"type": "stripped_acacia_log", "quantity": 31, "index": 20}, {"type": "cut_red_sandstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 21}, {"type": "cyan_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 22}, {"type": "brown_dye", "quantity": 29, "index": 26}, {"type": "orange_stained_glass", "quantity": 13, "index": 27}, {"type": "bell", "quantity": 45, "index": 28}, {"type": "wolf_spawn_egg", "quantity": 53, "index": 30}, {"type": "iron_pickaxe", "quantity": 1, "index": 33}, {"type": "chiseled_red_sandstone", "quantity": 2, "index": 37}, {"type": "dead_bubble_coral_fan", "quantity": 33, "index": 38}, {"type": "netherite_pickaxe", "quantity": 1, "index": 39}, {"type": "snow", "quantity": 21, "index": 40}, {"type": "damaged_anvil", "quantity": 60, "index": 41}, {"type": "red_sandstone", "quantity": 3, "index": 44}]

thought: To craft red_sandstone_stairs, I need to place 3 red_sandstone|chiseled_red_sandstone|cut_red_sandstone in a stair pattern in the crafting grid. Therefore, I will first move one red_sandstone from slot 44 into the top left corner of the crafting grid (slot 1).
Ok
act: move from slot 44 to slot 1 with quantity 1
